data.title: JALT Publications
data.text:
We’re looking for a reliable, honest, and kind person to come teach English to our students.

As an English teacher at our school, you will mainly teach adult, university, and children's classes. You will also be responsible for proofreading and speech contest preparation as needed.

"Shokutaku" Full-Time English Language Instructors (SFELI) are hired on contracts for one-year terms renewable up to four times subject to approval by the screening committee. Please make sure to visit our website for more details. https://en.ritsumeikan-trust.jp/info/employment/

Employment term:

April 1, 2025 - March 31, 2028 (three years). After completion of this term, the contract may be renewed up to twice on a yearly basis.

We are looking for exceptional Research Mentors to provide the technical expertise and project management acumen necessary for success. We have a high demand for projects related to economics. Typical hours of operation are from 4pm to 10pm JST, weekdays, and 9am to 9pm JST, weekends.

ISA is now seeking full time talented instructors for our Global Competence Program across several regions of Japan. This is not an English program. It is a mindset program based on the 6 domains of the global competence framework.

Full-time (Tenure track. The position is defined for a fixed term of 3 years. The newly appointed faculty member undergoes a tenure review in his/her third year, and upon successfully passing the review, he/she becomes tenured faculty member.)

Fleming (www.e-fleming.com) is a Canadian run school with over 25 years in the Koshigaya area. We are looking for an energetic and passionate teacher for 6 Adult lessons and 1 Children’s lesson on Saturday from 10:00 am-6:00 pm.

To engage in English teaching and related research with a focus on developing communication skills at Seikei Gakuen, and in assisting with the administrative duties at the Institute. To teach a standard number of classes (8 classes per week) and perform other duties.

Available Position from October 1st 2024: Homeroom Teacher / PE Specialist. We are interested in applications from teachers with experience or interest in teaching PE to children at primary school either as a specialist or in a supporting role.

Positions available from April 2025: Lower Grade (grades 1 or 2) or Upper Grade (grades 3, 4 or 5) Homeroom Teachers. We are particularly interested in applications from teachers with experience in teaching music to children at primary school either as a specialist or in a supporting role.

Lecturer or assistant professor in the Department of Contemporary English in the field of Applied Linguistics. This is a one-year contract renewable up to a total of five years. The applicant can apply for tenure after two or three years depending on the job title at time of hiring.

The Interdepartmental English Language Program is a coordinated program emphasizing “English for General Academic Purposes” (EGAP). We seek to hire cooperative teachers who understand the goals and objectives of the program and who will participate actively to achieve them.
